message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I get $60, you get $40. We can avoid losing money to inflation this way.
Let's be fair, Alice. I'm willing to take a bit less than half to close this quickly.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. I'll take a bit less than my last offer - $55 to me and $45 for you.  We're losing money with each round!
